column5: Does anybody know if there are any campgrounds on Lac Seul? I would love to bring the family up in the RV. Any help would greatly be appreciated.Thanks
Check out Whitewing resort on Goose Bay. They have camping facilities with clean showers and rest rooms.

You may want to check with Goldpines Camp. They have RV stalls behind the cabins. I don't know how many in total, but there were some pretty good size motor homes there last summer. They too have a number of campers that just keep coming back year after year.
